Flicker Photo Gallery

Search Flicker Library

This Web application allows you to search for photos shared on flicker.
This photo gallery uses flicker api to fetch interesting photos or photos releted to the searched title. You can also select any tag to retrieve photos
The flicker api do not require you to login to flicker in order to retrieve photos

Log In with Facewbook

One of the great thing about this app is it allows you to search photos related to your interests.
Facebook login is required to allow access to your Facebook Likes. This app only retrieves the pages you have liked on facebook.
Once loggedin, you will see your likes in the tags bar with a facebook logo.
Click on any tag to get photos related to that title
